about_the_game:
Murder Miners X is the sequel to the #1 rated Xbox Live Indie Game: Murder Miners

Inspired by classic sci-fi console shooters, with block-based levels and the best movement mechanics.

This game is still in development, everything is subject to change, and the box art is placeholder.

Planned Features

  • ALL of the features of the original Murder Miners (except for the ones that suck)

  • REAL fancy graphics powered by Unreal Engine

  • BIGGER maps with hybrid smooth terrain and block system

  • LOTS of new weapons, vehicles, and equipment

  • TONS of new zombie abilities, and a more interesting zombie leveling system

  • BETTER map making

  • THE smoothest movement mechanics (parkour)

  • MORE enemy types for Zombie AI, and better AI all around

  • EVEN MORE multiplayer game modes, and much better game customization options.

  • NEW Missions mode: Use the Map Maker to design missions using AI spawners and basic logic control. Compete solo or coop for the best mission score on the leaderboards.

  • HUGE Adventure Mode: Explore a randomly generated world full of powerful artifacts, dangerous enemies, and dark secrets.

  • BOOBA

  • Believe

Jump into the Discussions and let us know what you are excited about.

Community

  • Wishlist and Follow this page to get updates, and find is on YouTube and X(Twitter)!

content_descriptors.notes:
Exaggerated blood and dismemberment effects

Suggestive themes

name: Murder Miners X

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8, 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 2 Quad Q9550 2.83GHz or Phenom II X4 955
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1060 GTX or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: The long-awaited sequel to the #1 rated Xbox Live Indie Game is not here yet, but it will be (Believe). Classic FPS gunplay with awesome parkour. Online, 4 player SPLITSCREEN! Block-based destructible maps. Vehicles. Zombies. PVP Infection: Devour your victims, get new zombie powers!
